publ: by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
name: TheFriend
0:
”Alexa, open The Friend magazine.”
”Alexa, ask The Friend magazine to play the friend playlist”
”Alexa, ask The Friend magazine to play the story of the day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the friend magazine
Developer Terms of Use
des: Play stories and music from the Friend magazine on your Alexa smart speakers with the Friend skill. Listen to uplifting stories or to the Friend playlist: a mix of stories and music specially selected by the Friend magazine to help you feel the love of Jesus Christ.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
